description: Modernisation to provide 19 no.2 bedroom 12 no.3 bedroom and 5 no.4 bedroom dwellings involving a new lift tower entrance lobbies and bin stores  with associated landscaping and car parking areas.  Applicants Plan Nos: 101 102 103 105 107 109 110 111
decision_conditions: To comply with the provisions of Section 41(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1971.
